ADMINPASSWORD.name: ADMINPASSWORD
ADMINPASSWORD.description: Admin password for first setup; updates INI_Password if changed.

DISABLE_ANTICHEAT.name: DISABLE_ANTICHEAT
DISABLE_ANTICHEAT.description: Disable AntiCheatProtectionType entries by index or ranges.

MOD_IDS.name: MOD_IDS
MOD_IDS.description: Mod IDs for the server; replaces INI_Mods.

SERVERPRESET.name: SERVERPRESET
SERVERPRESET.description: Preset name for SandboxVars; copies preset on first run or when SERVERPRESETREPLACE is true.

WORKSHOP_IDS.name: WORKSHOP_IDS
WORKSHOP_IDS.description: Workshop IDs and collections; replaces INI_WorkshopItems.

ADMINPASSWORD_FILE.name: ADMINPASSWORD_FILE
ADMINPASSWORD_FILE.description: Path to a file containing the admin password.

CLEAN_WORKSHOP_ALLOW_REMOVE_ALL.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_ALLOW_REMOVE_ALL
CLEAN_WORKSHOP_ALLOW_REMOVE_ALL.description: Allow cleanup to remove all items if none match.

CLEAN_WORKSHOP_DRY_RUN.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_DRY_RUN
CLEAN_WORKSHOP_DRY_RUN.description: List items that would be removed during workshop cleanup.

CLEAN_WORKSHOP_KEEP_FILE.name: CLEAN_WORKSHOP_KEEP_FILE
CLEAN_WORKSHOP_KEEP_FILE.description: Write resolved workshop IDs to this file.

PASSWORD_FILE.name: PASSWORD_FILE
PASSWORD_FILE.description: Path to a file containing the server password.

RCONPASSWORD_FILE.name: RCONPASSWORD_FILE
RCONPASSWORD_FILE.description: Path to a file containing the RCON password.

SERVERPRESETREPLACE.name: SERVERPRESETREPLACE
SERVERPRESETREPLACE.description: Replace existing SandboxVars with preset when true.

STEAMAPPBRANCH.name: STEAMAPPBRANCH
STEAMAPPBRANCH.description: Steam branch to install/update (e.g., stable, unstable).

STEAM_API_KEY.name: STEAM_API_KEY
STEAM_API_KEY.description: Steam Web API key for resolving collections.

AllowDestructionBySledgehammer.name: AllowDestructionBySledgehammer
AllowDestructionBySledgehammer.description: Allow players to destroy world objects with sledgehammers

AllowNonAsciiUsername.name: AllowNonAsciiUsername
AllowNonAsciiUsername.description: Allow use of non-ASCII (cyrillic etc) characters in usernames

AnnounceAnimalDeath.name: AnnounceAnimalDeath
AnnounceAnimalDeath.description: If checked, every time an animal dies a global message will be displayed in the chat

AnnounceDeath.name: AnnounceDeath
AnnounceDeath.description: If checked, every time a player dies a global message will be displayed in the chat

AutoCreateUserInWhiteList.name: AutoCreateUserInWhiteList
AutoCreateUserInWhiteList.description: Add unknown usernames to the whitelist when players join. Clients will supply their own username/password on joining. (This is for Open=true servers)

BadWordListFile.name: BadWordListFile
BadWordListFile.description: Path to the file with the list of words to be prohibited. Each word must be on a separate line

BadWordPolicy.name: BadWordPolicy
BadWordPolicy.description: What to do with the sender of a bad word in the chat: 1 - ban, 2 - kick, 3 - record the violation in the database, 4 - mute

BadWordReplacement.name: BadWordReplacement
BadWordReplacement.description: The symbol or piece of text that will replace the bad word

BloodSplatLifespanDays.name: BloodSplatLifespanDays
BloodSplatLifespanDays.description: Number of days before old blood splats are removed.\nRemoval happens when map chunks are loaded.\nZero means they will never disappear Min: 0 Max: 365 Default: 0

CarEngineAttractionModifier.name: CarEngineAttractionModifier
CarEngineAttractionModifier.description: Modify the range of zombie attraction to cars. (Lower values can help with lag.) Min: 0.00 Max: 10.00 Default: 0.50

DefaultPort.name: DefaultPort
DefaultPort.description: Default starting port for player data. If UDP, this is this one of two ports used. Min: 0 Max: 65535 Default: 16261

DisableRadioAdmin.name: DisableRadioAdmin
DisableRadioAdmin.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'admin' access level

DisableRadioGM.name: DisableRadioGM
DisableRadioGM.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'gm' access level

DisableRadioInvisible.name: DisableRadioInvisible
DisableRadioInvisible.description: Disables radio transmissions from invisible players

DisableRadioModerator.name: DisableRadioModerator
DisableRadioModerator.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'moderator' access level

DisableRadioOverseer.name: DisableRadioOverseer
DisableRadioOverseer.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'overseer' access level

DisableRadioStaff.name: DisableRadioStaff
DisableRadioStaff.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with an access level

DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected.name: DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected
DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected.description: Safehouse acts like a normal house if a member of the safehouse is connected (so secure when players are offline)

DiscordEnable.name: DiscordEnable
DiscordEnable.description: Enables global text chat integration with a Discord channel

DisplayUserName.name: DisplayUserName
DisplayUserName.description: Display usernames above player's heads in-game.

DoLuaChecksum.name: DoLuaChecksum
DoLuaChecksum.description: Kick clients whose game files don't match the server's.

DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath.name: DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath
DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath.description: Remove player accounts from the whitelist after death. This prevents players creating a new character after death on Open=false servers

Faction.name: Faction
Faction.description: Players can create factions when true

FactionDaySurvivedToCreate.name: FactionDaySurvivedToCreate
FactionDaySurvivedToCreate.description: Players must survive this number of in-game days before being allowed to create a faction Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 0

FactionPlayersRequiredForTag.name: FactionPlayersRequiredForTag
FactionPlayersRequiredForTag.description: Number of players required as faction members before the faction owner can create a group tag Min: 1 Max: 2147483647 Default: 1

FastForwardMultiplier.name: FastForwardMultiplier
FastForwardMultiplier.description: Governs how fast time passes while players sleep. Value multiplies the speed of the time that passes during sleeping. Min: 1.00 Max: 100.00 Default: 40.00

GlobalChat.name: GlobalChat
GlobalChat.description: Toggles global chat on or off.

GoodWordListFile.name: GoodWordListFile
GoodWordListFile.description: Path to the file with the list of words that should be allowed, even if they contain bad word. Each word should be on a separate line.

HideAdminsInPlayerList.name: HideAdminsInPlayerList
HideAdminsInPlayerList.description: Hides admins in the player list.

HidePlayersBehindYou.name: HidePlayersBehindYou
HidePlayersBehindYou.description: If true, automatically hide the player you can't see (like zombies).

ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer.name: ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer
ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer.description: Maximum number of items that can be placed in a container.  Zero means there is no limit. (PLEASE NOTE: This includes individual small items such as nails. A limit of 50 will mean only 50 nails can be stored.) Min: 0 Max: 9000 Default: 0

KnockedDownAllowed.name: KnockedDownAllowed
KnockedDownAllowed.description: WIP: Activating this setting may cause visual desynchronization of player positions.

Map.name: Map
Map.description: Enter the foldername of the mod found in \Steam\steamapps\workshop\modID\mods\modName\media\maps\

MapRemotePlayerVisibility.name: MapRemotePlayerVisibility
MapRemotePlayerVisibility.description: Controls display of remote players on the in-game map. 1=Hidden 2=Friends 3=Everyone Min: 1 Max: 3 Default: 1

MaxAccountsPerUser.name: MaxAccountsPerUser
MaxAccountsPerUser.description: Limits the number of different accounts a single Steam user may create on this server. Ignored when using the Hosts button. Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 0

MaxPlayers.name: MaxPlayers
MaxPlayers.description: Maximum number of players that can be on the server at one time. This excludes admins.\nWARNING: Server player counts above 32 will potentially result in poor map streaming and desync. Please advance with caution. Min: 1 Max: 100 Default: 32

Mods.name: Mods
Mods.description: Enter the mod loading ID here. It can be found in \Steam\steamapps\workshop\modID\mods\modName\info.txt

MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.name: MouseOverToSeeDisplayName
MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.description: If true, players will have to mouse over someone to see their display name.

MultiplayerStatisticsPeriod.name: MultiplayerStatisticsPeriod
MultiplayerStatisticsPeriod.description: Sets the multiplayer update period in seconds. Statistics is disabled if value is 0. Min: 0 Max: 10 Default: 1

NoFire.name: NoFire
NoFire.description: All forms of fire are disabled - except for campfires

Open.name: Open
Open.description: Clients may join without already having an account in the whitelist. If set to false, administrators must manually create username/password combos.

PVP.name: PVP
PVP.description: Players can hurt and kill other players

PVPFirearmDamageModifier.name: PVPFirearmDamageModifier
PVPFirearmDamageModifier.description: Damage multiplier for PVP ranged attacks. Min: 0.00 Max: 500.00 Default: 50.00

PVPLogToolChat.name: PVPLogToolChat
PVPLogToolChat.description: PVP is logged to admin chat

PVPMeleeDamageModifier.name: PVPMeleeDamageModifier
PVPMeleeDamageModifier.description: Damage multiplier for PVP melee attacks. Min: 0.00 Max: 500.00 Default: 30.00

PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.name: PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction
PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.description: If true, player can hit again when struck by another player.

Password.name: Password
Password.description: Clients must know this password to join the server. (Ignored when hosting a server via the Host button)

PauseEmpty.name: PauseEmpty
PauseEmpty.description: Game time stops when there are no players online

PerkLogs.name: PerkLogs
PerkLogs.description: Track changes in player perk levels in PerkLog.txt server log

PingLimit.name: PingLimit
PingLimit.description: Ping limit, in milliseconds, before a player is kicked from the server. (Set to 0 to disable) Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 0

PlayerBumpPlayer.name: PlayerBumpPlayer
PlayerBumpPlayer.description: Governs whether players bump (and knock over) other players when running through them.

PlayerRespawnWithOther.name: PlayerRespawnWithOther
PlayerRespawnWithOther.description: Players can respawn in-game at a split screen / Remote Play player's location

PlayerRespawnWithSelf.name: PlayerRespawnWithSelf
PlayerRespawnWithSelf.description: Players can respawn in-game at the coordinates where they died

PlayerSafehouse.name: PlayerSafehouse
PlayerSafehouse.description: Both admins and players can claim safehouses

Public.name: Public
Public.description: Shows the server on the in-game browser. (Note: Steam-enabled servers are always visible in the Steam server browser)

PublicDescription.name: PublicDescription
PublicDescription.description: Description displayed in the in-game public server browser. Typing   will create a new line in your description

PublicName.name: PublicName
PublicName.description: Name of the server displayed in the in-game browser and, if applicable, the Steam browser

RCONPort.name: RCONPort
RCONPort.description: The port for the RCON (Remote Console) Min: 0 Max: 65535 Default: 27015

RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.name: RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval
RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.description: If enabled, when HoursForCorpseRemoval triggers, it will also remove playerâ€™s corpses from the ground.

ResetID.name: ResetID
ResetID.description: Reset ID determines if the server has undergone a soft-reset. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. Used in conjunction with PlayerServerID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 725655479

SafeHouseRemovalTime.name: SafeHouseRemovalTime
SafeHouseRemovalTime.description: Players are automatically removed from a safehouse they have not visited for this many real-world hours Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 144

SafehouseAllowLoot.name: SafehouseAllowLoot
SafehouseAllowLoot.description: Allow non-members to take items from safehouses

SafehouseAllowNonResidential.name: SafehouseAllowNonResidential
SafehouseAllowNonResidential.description: Governs whether players can claim non-residential buildings.

SafehouseAllowRespawn.name: SafehouseAllowRespawn
SafehouseAllowRespawn.description: Players will respawn in a safehouse that they were a member of before they died

SafehouseAllowTrepass.name: SafehouseAllowTrepass
SafehouseAllowTrepass.description: Allow non-members to enter a safehouse without being invited

SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim.name: SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim
SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim.description: Players must have survived this number of in-game days before they are allowed to claim a safehouse Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 0

SafehousePreventsLootRespawn.name: SafehousePreventsLootRespawn
SafehousePreventsLootRespawn.description: Items will not respawn in buildings that players have claimed as a safehouse

SafetyCooldownTimer.name: SafetyCooldownTimer
SafetyCooldownTimer.description: The delay before a player can enter or leave PVP mode again, having recently done so Min: 0 Max: 1000 Default: 3

SafetySystem.name: SafetySystem
SafetySystem.description: Players can enter and leave PVP on an individual basis. A player can only hurt another player when at least one of them is in PVP mode - as shown by the unobscured skull and crossbones on the left of the screen. When SafetySystem=false, players are free to hurt each other at any time if PVP is enabled.

SafetyToggleTimer.name: SafetyToggleTimer
SafetyToggleTimer.description: The time it takes for a player to enter and leave PVP mode Min: 0 Max: 1000 Default: 2

SaveWorldEveryMinutes.name: SaveWorldEveryMinutes
SaveWorldEveryMinutes.description: Loaded parts of the map are saved after this set number of real-world minutes have passed. (The map is usually saved only after clients leave a loaded area) Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 0

Seed.name: Seed
Seed.description: The worldgen seed used to generate the world.\nIf you want to change this, put a new value in and delete map_worldgen.bin in your save directory.

ServerPlayerID.name: ServerPlayerID
ServerPlayerID.description: ServerPlayerID determines if a character is from another server, or single player. This value may be changed by soft resets. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. This is used in conjunction with ResetID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

ServerWelcomeMessage.name: ServerWelcomeMessage
ServerWelcomeMessage.description: The first welcome message visible in the chat panel. This will be displayed immediately after player login. you can use RGB colours to chance the colour of the welcome message. You can also use < LINE>, without the space, to create a separate lines within your text. Use: \<RGB:1,0,0> This message will show up red!

ShowFirstAndLastName.name: ShowFirstAndLastName
ShowFirstAndLastName.description: Display first & last name above player's heads.

ShowSafety.name: ShowSafety
ShowSafety.description: Display a skull icon over the head of players who have entered PVP mode

SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse.name: SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse
SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse.description: Allow players to destroy world objects only in their safehouse (require AllowDestructionBySledgehammer to true).

SleepAllowed.name: SleepAllowed
SleepAllowed.description: Players are allowed to sleep when their survivor becomes tired, but they do not NEED to sleep

SleepNeeded.name: SleepNeeded
SleepNeeded.description: Players get tired and need to sleep. (Ignored if SleepAllowed=false)

SpawnItems.name: SpawnItems
SpawnItems.description: Item types new players spawn with. Separate multiple item types with commas. Example: Base.Axe,Base.Bag_BigHikingBag

SpawnPoint.name: SpawnPoint
SpawnPoint.description: Force every new player to spawn at these set x,y,z world coordinates. Find desired coordinates at map.projectzomboid.com. (Ignored when 0,0,0)

SteamScoreboard.name: SteamScoreboard
SteamScoreboard.description: Show Steam usernames and avatars in the Players list.

TrashDeleteAll.name: TrashDeleteAll
TrashDeleteAll.description: If true, player can use the "delete all" button on bins.

UPnP.name: UPnP
UPnP.description: Attempt to configure a UPnP-enabled internet gateway to automatically setup port forwarding rules. The server will fall back to default ports if this fails

VoiceMaxDistance.name: VoiceMaxDistance
VoiceMaxDistance.description: The maximum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard. Min: 0.00 Max: 100000.00 Default: 100.00

VoiceMinDistance.name: VoiceMinDistance
VoiceMinDistance.description: The minimum tile distance over which VOIP sounds can be heard. Min: 0.00 Max: 100000.00 Default: 10.00

WarDuration.name: WarDuration
WarDuration.description: War duration in seconds. Min: 60 Max: 2147483647 Default: 3600

WarSafehouseHitPoints.name: WarSafehouseHitPoints
WarSafehouseHitPoints.description: Safehouse hit points limit. Min: 0 Max: 2147483647 Default: 3

WarStartDelay.name: WarStartDelay
WarStartDelay.description: Time in seconds before the war starts. Min: 60 Max: 2147483647 Default: 600

WorkshopItems.name: WorkshopItems
WorkshopItems.description: List Workshop Mod IDs for the server to download. Each must be separated by a semicolon. Example: WorkshopItems=514427485;513111049

server_browser_announced_ip.name: server_browser_announced_ip
server_browser_announced_ip.description: Set the IP from which the server is broadcast. This is for network configurations with multiple IP addresses, such as server farms

LootItemRemovalList.name: LootItemRemovalList
LootItemRemovalList.description:
FoodLoot = 4,
    CannedFoodLoot = 4,
    LiteratureLoot = 4,
    SurvivalGearsLoot = 4,
    MedicalLoot = 4,
    WeaponLoot = 4,
    RangedWeaponLoot = 4,
    AmmoLoot = 4,
    MechanicsLoot = 4,
    OtherLoot = 4,

WorldItemRemovalList.name: WorldItemRemovalList
WorldItemRemovalList.description: please ensure that Base.Maggots stays in the list with any future changes due to corpse maggots,
